metadata.Name: Shamela Corpus
metadata.Description: A large corpus of Classical Arabic texts with methods for detecting text reuse and dating texts.
metadata.Paper Title: Corpus Enhancements for Classical Arabic Texts
metadata.Venue Title: Conference on Computational Linguistics and Financial Engineering (CLFL)
metadata.Abstract: This paper discusses enhancements to the Shamela corpus, focusing on methods for detecting text reuse and dating texts. The text reuse algorithm uses a hash-based approach to identify matching passages, while the text dating method employs language models to predict the date of undated texts. Both methods show promising results, with the text reuse algorithm identifying significant quotations and the text dating method achieving high accuracy.
